objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='background' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0C1023'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#212D5E'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='glowEffect' cx='70%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='70%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#6E4EFD;stop-opacity:0.6'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#6E4EFD;stop-opacity:0'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#background)'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#0A0E1E'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#0F102B'/><circle cx='800' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#glowEffect)'/><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M100,100 l50,0 l0,50 l-50,0 z' fill='#6E4EFD'/><path d='M200,200 l30,0 l0,30 l-30,0 z' fill='#6E4EFD'/><path d='M120,300 l40,0 l0,40 l-40,0 z' fill='#6E4EFD'/><path d='M250,400 l20,0 l0,20 l-20,0 z' fill='#6E4EFD'/><path d='M150,500 l25,0 l0,25 l-25,0 z' fill='#6E4EFD'/><path d='M300,150 l35,0 l0,35 l-35,0 z' fill='#6E4EFD'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M900,200 l50,0 l0,50 l-50,0 z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M950,300 l30,0 l0,30 l-30,0 z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M870,400 l40,0 l0,40 l-40,0 z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M920,500 l20,0 l0,20 l-20,0 z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M850,600 l25,0 l0,25 l-25,0 z' fill='#FFFFFF'/><path d='M980,250 l35,0 l0,35 l-35,0 z' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Sleek transparent design with blue
   LED lighting effects
• Digital display shows precise
   battery level and connection status
• Advanced touch controls for
   music and call management
• Premium stereo sound with deep bass

product_details.name: Crystal Clear Transparent Wireless Earbuds with LED Display - Premium Sound & Style
product_details.description:
• Sleek transparent design showcasing high-tech internals with stunning LED blue lighting effects
• Digital LED display shows precise battery level and connection status
• Advanced touch controls for seamless music and call management
• Clear see-through charging case with modern aesthetic appeal
• Left/Right channel indicators for easy identification
• Ergonomic ear tip design for comfortable, secure fit
• High-quality stereo sound with deep bass response
• Wireless charging case with LED power indicator
• Bluetooth 5.0+ technology for stable connectivity
• IPX5 water-resistant protection for workout sessions
• Premium build quality with durable transparent materials
• Quick pairing technology for instant device connection

banner_details:
The banner is a sleek and futuristic promotional design for wireless earbuds, split into left and right sections. The left half features a bold heading (`heading`) introducing the product, followed by a purple subheading text layer (`tagline`). A red rectangular badge (`discount_badge`) with contrasting white text (`discount_text`) highlights a discount. Textual benefits are listed clearly in a bullet-point layout (`description`). Below that, the price is emphasized with a bold white font (`price`) and a purple original price (`original_price`). A purple rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) contains centered white text (`cta`). On the right side, a crystal-clear transparent earbud image (`product_image`) is centered on a dark background enhanced with a glowing radial gradient. The vibrant elements and clean typography give a modern electronic aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: #0C1023
- Blue-Black: #0F102B
- Accent Purple: #6E4EFD
- Glow Purple (with opacity): #6E4EFD (0.6–0%)
- Highlight Red: #FF3B5C
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a modern and futuristic earbud set enclosed in a transparent charging case, using a sleek and minimalistic color palette. Dominant colors include glossy black (#000000), deep space gray (#2F2F2F), electric violet (#6C00FF), and crisp white (#FFFFFF) used in the LED display. The transparent casing adds a cool, reflective chrome look (#D3D3D3) that blends subtly with the internal circuitry. The electric violet highlights the internal ring and is beautifully diffused to accentuate the digital core, drawing user focus. For an advertisement banner, pairing cool grayscale tones with bright violet will create an eye-catching, tech-savvy appeal.
